remarks: Lemma for ~ lcfr .  Combine ~ lcfrlem27 and ~ lcfrlem37 . (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcfrlem38.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfrlem38.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrlem38.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrlem38.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.q $e |- Q = ( LSubSp ` D ) $.
lcfrlem38.c $e |- C = { f e. ( LFnl ` U ) | ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` f ) ) ) = ( L ` f ) } $.
lcfrlem38.e $e |- E = U_ g e. G ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) $.
lcfrlem38.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfrlem38.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Q ) $.
lcfrlem38.gs $e |- ( ph -> G C_ C ) $.
lcfrlem38.xe $e |- ( ph -> X e. E ) $.
lcfrlem38.ye $e |- ( ph -> Y e. E ) $.
lcfrlem38.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.x $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .0. ) $.
lcfrlem38.y $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= .0. ) $.
lcfrlem38.sp $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.ne $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lcfrlem38.b $e |- B = ( ( N ` { X , Y } ) i^i ( ._|_ ` { ( X .+ Y ) } ) ) $.
lcfrlem38.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. B ) $.
lcfrlem38.n $e |- ( ph -> I =/= .0. ) $.
lcfrlem38.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcfrlem38.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
lcfrlem38.j $e |- J = ( x e. ( V \ { .0. } ) |-> ( v e. V |-> ( iota_ k e. R E. w e. ( ._|_ ` { x } ) v = ( w .+ ( k .x. x ) ) ) ) ) $.
lcfrlem38 $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) e. E ) $.
$d .+ f g k v w x $.
$d .0. f g k x $.
$d ._|_ f g k v w x $.
$d .x. f k v w x $.
$d D g k $.
$d G g k $.
$d I g k $.
$d J f g k $.
$d L f g k $.
$d R f k v x $.
$d S g k $.
$d U f g k v w x $.
$d V f g v x $.
$d X f g k v w x $.
$d Y f g k v w x $.
$d g k ph $.
